column1: Local Foods////Stopped by this gem of a place for a late lunch and it was great. Â Ordered the "Crunchy" chicken with homemade chips and Tuscan kale... The chicken was juicy and flavorful
column2: the bread was delicious and the lemony flavor of the kale made the dish zing! We also ordered the Bacon Steak & Egg with a side of chicken posole...the steak was very tender and sooo good! We were iffy about green posole but so glad we gave it a try. It was phenomenal. You must try this place
